titleinfo.title: Indians for Indians Radio Show, Caddo, July 1961 and July 1964

mods.tableOfContents: First Group: Ten songs, "Cherokee Dances." July 10, 1964. Second Group: About ten songs including the "Bell Dance" of the Caddos. July 1961.
mods.note: When citing recordings from this collection, please using the following: Indians for Indians Radio Show. Western History Collections, University of Oklahoma Libraries.
